mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_review where review_state = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_STATE = 'Y' AND PDT_NO=#{pdtNo}

SELECT REVIEW_NO, NICKNAME, REVIEW_SCORE, REVIEW_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REVIEW_CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:mm') "CREATE_DATE", REVIEW_MODIFY_DATE, PDT_NAME, USER_PROFILE, REVIEW_FILE_PATH||'/'||REVIEW_FILE_UPLOAD "thumbnail_path", PDT_FILE_PATH||'/'||PDT_FILE_UPLOAD "product_path", TO_CHAR(PDT_OPTION_PRICE,'L999,999,999') "PDT_PRICE" FROM TB_REVIEW JOIN TB_USER USING(USER_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION USING(PDT_OPTION_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING(PDT_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_FILE USING(PDT_NO) JOIN TB_REVIEW_FILE USING(REVIEW_NO) WHERE REVIEW_FILE_INDEX = 0 AND PDT_FILE_INDEX = 0 ORDER BY REVIEW_CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_SCORE, REVIEW_CONTENT, NICKNAME, REVIEW_FILE_PATH||'/'||REVIEW_FILE_UPLOAD "thumbnail_path" FROM TB_REVIEW JOIN TB_REVIEW_FILE USING(REVIEW_NO) JOIN TB_USER USING(USER_NO) WHERE PDT_NO = #{pdtNo} AND REVIEW_FILE_INDEX=0 ORDER BY REVIEW_CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT REVIEW_NO, NICKNAME, REVIEW_SCORE, REVIEW_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REVIEW_CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:mm') "CREATE_DATE", REVIEW_MODIFY_DATE, PDT_NAME, USER_PROFILE, PDT_FILE_PATH||'/'||PDT_FILE_UPLOAD "product_path", TO_CHAR(PDT_OPTION_PRICE,'L999,999,999') "PDT_PRICE" FROM TB_REVIEW JOIN TB_USER USING(USER_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION USING(PDT_OPTION_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING(PDT_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_FILE USING(PDT_NO) WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} AND PDT_FILE_INDEX = 0
SELECT REVIEW_FILE_PATH||'/'||REVIEW_FILE_UPLOAD "image_path" FROM TB_REVIEW_FILE WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
SELECT REVIEW_LIKE_FLAG FROM TB_REVIEW_LIKE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND REVIEW_NO = #{contentNo}

SELECT TO_CHAR(COUNT(CASE WHEN REVIEW_LIKE_FLAG='L' THEN 1 END),'FM999,999,999') likeCount, TO_CHAR(COUNT(CASE WHEN REVIEW_LIKE_FLAG='D' THEN 1 END),'FM999,999,999') dislikeCount FROM TB_REVIEW_LIKE WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{contentNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REVIEW( REVIEW_NO, USER_NO, REVIEW_SCORE, REVIEW_CONTENT, PDT_OPTION_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEW.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{reviewScore}, #{reviewContent}, #{pdtNo} )
